page.title: 10Pets
page.content: I learnt that the people in my class like pets and only a few people don't have pets. The most popular pets were cats and then came dogs.The most common colours for cats are black, white, ginger and grey. Dogs and cats are kept in boxes and baskets with blankets, pillows and straw bedding. The most common dogs are black Labradors. Spaniels, Jack Russels, Sheep dogs and Yorkshire Terriers are less popular. Other pets are Hamsters, Goldfish, Pigions, Canaries,Tortoises, Goats, Geese, Budgerigars, Hens, Guineapigs, Ducks, Rabbits and Gerbils. Reepham is a good place to have pets like cats and dogs because most people have big gardens and there is a lot of country-side around Reepham where you can take your dog for a walk.
